node.title: Two teenagers hospitalised after being shot in Invercargill
node.description: A teenager is in a critical condition and another is in a serious condition after being shot during an incident in Invercargill.
node.content:
["A teenager is in a critical condition and another teenager is in a serious condition after being shot during an incident in Invercargill.", "", "
\nPhoto: 123RF\n
", "Emergency services were called to an address on Centre Street at 1.10am.", "Police have confirmed a 17-year-old female and a 16-year-old male received gunshot wounds, and were flown to Dunedin Hospital.", "Police remain at the address and will be conducting a scene examination.", "Anyone with information should contact the police on 105 or call Crime Stoppers anonymously on 0800 555 111."]
